contentrichtext.text: K Foundation poster. {{Non-free use rationale | Article = The K Foundation burn a million quid | Description = Advertisement in ''The Guardian'' announcing the screening tour for the film | Source = Scan from ''The Guardian'' | Portion = Entire advert | Low_resolution = yes | Purpose = To illustrate the publicity material used for promoting the screening tour for the film. The tour is the primary subject of the "Screening tour" section of the article, and the publicity is also the subject of discussion. | Replaceability = No free replacement possible for copyrighted publicity material }} {{Non-free poster|image has rationale=yes}} [[Category:Images of The KLF]] [[Category:Film poster images]]
